HeroSection.title: English Phoneme Reference
HeroSection.description: Reference tool for understanding English phonemes. Click on any symbol to see articulation details, example words, and audio pronunciation.

consonants.title: Consonant Phonemes
consonants.description: Consonant sounds organized by type and characteristics. Click any phoneme for detailed pronunciation information.

vowels.title: Vowel Phonemes
vowels.description: Vowel sounds organized by type and characteristics. Click any phoneme for pronunciation details.
